name: Chemical analysis of PAK's, Organotin, PCB's, PBDE's and organochlorine pesticides as possible endocrine disruptors in Scheldt estuary
description: Water, sediment, suspended matter and biotawere sampled alongthe Western Scheldt from 2002to 2006. All matrices were analysed for PAK's, Organotin, PCB's, PBDE's and OCl pesticidesusing GCMS and GCMS/MS.
